sentences.en: Analysis is conducted informally and irregularly, usually upon customer request.
sentences.cn: 分析工作以非正式及非定期方式执行, 通常是基于客户要求.

sentences.en: Crudely or irregularly fashioned verse , often of a humorous or burlesque nature.
sentences.cn: 打油诗多属幽默滑稽之作粗劣或无章法的诗.

sentences.en: Good golfers do better if they give themselves little time to prepare for their shots--and even better if they are distracted by researchers asking them to count irregularly spaced sounds.
sentences.cn: 优秀的高尔夫球手在击球前准备的时间越少成绩越好—即使被研究人员骚扰，让他们数不规则间隔的声响，最后击球成绩依然不俗。

sentences.en: He was eating irregularly, steadily losing weight.
sentences.cn: 他饮食无规律，慢慢消瘦了下去。

sentences.en: In English " to have " conjugates irregularly.
sentences.cn: 英语中“tohave ” 变化不规则.

sentences.en: Located off-center in the irregularly shaped lake was a fountain.
sentences.cn: 在这个形状不规则的湖泊的湖心以外的地方有一眼喷泉。

sentences.en: Other galaxies are placed irregularly in space.
sentences.cn: 其它星系不规则地位于太空中.

sentences.en: Our tents were irregularly spaced out on the leeside of the hill.
sentences.cn: 我们的帐篷不规则地散布在小山背风的一面.

sentences.en: Plants sparsely scabrous; ultimate leaf segments irregularly serrate or dentate.
sentences.cn: 装置疏生粗糙; 不规则的末级的叶裂片有锯齿或具牙齿.

sentences.en: Some women ovulate irregularly because their pituitary glands secrete too much prolactin.
sentences.cn: 有些不规则排卵的患者垂体腺分泌过多催乳素.

sentences.en: The glove went through a series of designs, with dots and patches of different shapes and colors, but the current version is covered with 20 irregularly shaped patches that use 10 different colors.
sentences.cn: 这个手套经过了一系列的设计，试过不同形状和颜色的点状和块状布料，不过目前的版本是覆盖着20种不规则形状、10种不同颜色的块状布料。

sentences.en: The paddles administer a shock to people whose hearts are beating irregularly.
sentences.cn: 它会给那些心律不齐的人来个震动治疗.

sentences.en: The prothalli are saprophytic, irregularly branched, subterranean bodies.
sentences.cn: 原叶体是腐生的, 不规则分枝的地下体.

sentences.en: They are fingerlike holes caused by internal corrosion and distributed irregularly.
sentences.cn: 取样解剖后发现,穿孔多为手指状的直孔,几乎都由内壁点腐蚀引起.

sentences.en: They then undergo further morphological changes into swollen and irregularly shaped organisms.
sentences.cn: 然后它们在肿胀的、形状不规则的根部进一步发生形态上的变化.

sentences.en: To hold and join the business skill in company irregularly.
sentences.cn: 不定期组织和参加公司内部业务技能培训.

words.tran_cn: 不规则的；无规律的；非正规的；不合法的
不规则物；不合规格的产品
